item.title: When it rains the cover is incredibly slippery., 29th November
item.description:
The ironwork is on Jessop Avenue just outside the Honeybourne sign. Please can you replace the cover as when this is wet it is incredibly slippery. I have fallen over here and slipped several times.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Jessop Avenue, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Up Hatherley path needs levelling to prevent water pools, 29th November
item.description:
Users have to go round the standing water due to uneven path. Pools on path are by lamp No.22. See photos.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Up Hatherley Way, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface

item.title: Junction blocked, 29th November
item.description:
The junction is blocked between the Cloisters and Finley way. The 3 way signalling doesn't work for traffic leaving the Cloisters, it remains always on red. Why is this here blocking the junction while no work is being carried out? Nothing being done since it was installed and all this weekend?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 21, The Cloisters, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Constant dog fouling, 29th November
